artist: Editor: John Holmstrom; Publisher: Stoned Age Media
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves wth text, designs, marijuana leaf graphics, and an image of a man flexing his arm; 24 pp.
inscription: Front cover, lower left center, black sharpie: TO FLY! / JOHN / HOLMSTROM
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Stoned Age #1
